body:
Comment 3: 
---------- Forwarded message ----------
From: Jonas Pfenniger <jonas@new-bamboo.co.uk>
Date: Sat, Feb 11, 2012 at 10:47
Subject: [go-nuts] Re: Install problem on Lion
To: golang-nuts <golang-nuts@googlegroups.com>


Hi there,

I've been stuck with the same issue for a while. It used to work
before and I updated Xcode at some point before it stopped working but
I can't prove the correlation.
* Tried with `export GOARCH=amd64`, same result
* Tried changing the gcc options in make.bash, removing the -O2
optimisation, same result.
* gbd also has the "wrong version in compilation unit header" issue
and compiling my own gdb version sports another kind of issue "Unable
to find Mach task port for process-id 07846: (os/kern) failure (0x5)."
* kill -ABRT does nothing

Here are some infos that where requested on the thread:

hg changeset:   11883:4a0c77722a5e
Processor  2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
% sw_vers
ProductName:    Mac OS X
ProductVersion: 10.7.2
BuildVersion:   11C74
% gcc --version
i686-apple-darwin11-llvm-gcc-4.2 (GCC) 4.2.1 (Based on Apple Inc.
build 5658) (LLVM build 2336.1.00)
Copyright (C) 2007 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There
is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR
PURPOSE.
% env | grep GO
# nothing

------------------------- Build console ----------------------
% ./all.bash                                              
 ~/code/
adhoc/go/src
# Building C bootstrap tool.

go_bootstrap clean std
./all.bash  93.64s user 342.34s system 47% cpu 15:09.85 total
------------------------------------------------------------------

------------- Other terminal ----------------

% pstree -p 06497
-+= 00001 root /sbin/launchd
 \-+= 00427 zimbatm /sbin/launchd
   \-+= 48674 zimbatm /Applications/iTerm.app/Contents/MacOS/iTerm -
psn_0_15589
     \-+= 04588 zimbatm -/bin/zsh
       \-+= 06497 zimbatm bash ./all.bash
         \--- 07846 zimbatm ../bin/tool/go_bootstrap clean std
$ kill -ABRT 07846
# Does nothing
$ kill -9 07846


Cheers,
zimbatm
